definitions: The action of writing one's name on a document or letter to authenticate it or show agreement.
The action of using sign language to communicate.
The action of engaging someone for employment or a contract, especially in sports or entertainment.
The action of making a gesture or mark to convey information or a command.
examples: The signing of the peace treaty took hours.
She was signing to her deaf friend across the room.
The team announced the signing of a new player.
He was signing for silence during the performance.
